column4: CAN ANYBODY HELP ME LEARN TO HACK TO MAKE MY UBUNTU LINUX OS BETTER
i nee a person to talk to one on one
You are asking for too much for an IRC channel to provide.  Perhaps you should start by visiting http://ubuntuforums.org/forumdisplay.php?f=310 and reading the sticky postings on getting started.
If you want to know about bash, see http://tldp.org/LDP/abs/html/  and read "man bash"
